versions.note:
What’s new

  • Data deletion protocol implemented for deleting data into Trash Bin under each zone.
  • A Project-based File Manifest for describing and categorizing data can now be created and configured by Administrators.
  • File Manifest can be attached by the file uploader or their Project Administrator to data uploaded into the Green Room.
  • External open-source services of XWiki and Guacamole are deployed and configured with VRE Portal for documentation management and workbench initiation.
  • Contents Previewer implemented to allow users to view file structures inside ZIP files within the File Explorer.

Bug Fixes

  • Email notifications now can be sent by Platform Administrators to specific platform users from the Administrators Console.
  • Portal release notes are now available in the Portal page footer.
  • Fixed audit logs bug that was displaying incorrect file activities time.

What’s new

  • Single Sign-On Integration implemented between VRE Portal and workbench clients
  • Manual Data Copy workflow implemented for copying data from Green Room to Core.
  • Personal Collections can now be created by users for grouping and organizing files.

Bug Fixes

  • Attachments can now be added to support requests.
  • Sending a new platform invitation will now cause any previous invitations sent to the same email address to expire.
  • Fixed issue causing white page to appear on manual logout instead of the login page.
  • Fixed 403 errors occurring on page refresh in the Administrators Console.
  • Fixed issue in File Statistics that was causing logs from the previous day to be displayed.
  • Minor fixes to the User Management tab.

What's new

  • Enhanced file tagging & annotation
  • Data lineage graph
  • Search project attributes
  • Platform Administrators user management console, Search Panel and Properties Side Panel
  • Updated URL to include “/vre”extension
  • Revised content for clarity and flow.

What’s new

  • Initial Version
  • Updated text and screenshots for clarity;
  • Added Change Log
